item.title: 随着折扣加深，印度炼油商可能会购买更多俄罗斯石油
item.description: 由于与华盛顿的贸易谈判久拖不决，加上供应充足导致折扣扩大，印度炼油商预计将在未来几个月增加从俄罗斯进口石油。【原文：Indian refiners are expected to boost oil imports from Russia in the coming months, as trade talks with Washington drag on and discounts widen amid ample supplies.】

item.title: 税收错误被揭露后，英国借款减少 20 亿英镑
item.description: 英国国家统计局（Office for National Statistics）称，在税务局发现增值税收据数据有误后，英国本财年前五个月的借贷比之前想象的要少 20 亿英镑（合 27 亿美元）。【原文：UK borrowing in the first five months of the financial year was £2 billion ($2.7 billion) lower than previously thought after the tax office found an error in its VAT receipt data, the Office for National Statistics said.】

item.title: 日元观察家考虑走弱的下一条线在哪里
item.description: 在本周的市场震荡之后，日元兑美元目前距离 155 这一关键心理价位仅有一线之隔，投资者开始考虑在财政部再次干预之前，日元必须要走多弱。【原文：With the yen now at shooting distance from the key psychological level of 155 against the dollar after this week’s market jolt, investors have started to consider how weak the currency must go before the finance ministry intervenes again.】

item.title: 泰国在新领导人领导下意外维持利率不变；泰铢上涨
item.description: 泰国央行在新行长威泰-拉塔纳功（Vitai Ratanakorn）领导下召开的首次政策会议上出人意料地维持了关键利率不变，打破了再次降息的预期，因为在经济脆弱和泰铢坚挺的情况下，官员们要保留政策空间。【原文：The Bank of Thailand unexpectedly kept its key interest rate unchanged at the first policy meeting under new Governor Vitai Ratanakorn, defying expectations for another cut as officials preserve policy space amid a fragile economy and strong baht.】

item.title: 中国光学企业旭创光电据称考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国光通信模块和设备制造商中际创新光通信有限公司（Zhongji Innolight Co.【原文：Zhongji Innolight Co., a Chinese maker of optical communication modules and devices, is considering a listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 达成英格鲁交易后，泰克下调旗舰矿山指导价
item.description: 泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.）在与英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）达成十多年来最大的矿业交易之一后不到一个月，就下调了其智利旗舰铜矿的产量指导。【原文：Teck Resources Ltd. cut its output guidance for its flagship copper mine in Chile, little more than a month after agreeing one of the biggest mining deals in over a decade with Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的 Foundation Healthcare 据称酝酿在新加坡上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由新加坡投资公司淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Foundation Healthcare, backed by Singapore investment firm Temasek Holdings Pte., is considering an initial public offering that could value the medical group at more than $1 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 欧尔班要求降息，匈牙利通胀率保持在目标之上
item.description: 匈牙利的通货膨胀率连续第十个月保持在央行的容忍范围之外，这给受到总理维克托-欧尔班政府降息压力的决策者们带来了难题。【原文：Hungary’s inflation remained outside of the central bank’s tolerance band for a 10th month, presenting a conundrum to policymakers under pressure from Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 塔塔资本 17 亿美元首次公开募股最后一天获得足额认购
item.description: 塔塔资本有限公司（Tata Capital Ltd.）的首次公开募股规模达 1,550 亿卢比（合 17 亿美元），是印度今年规模最大的首次公开募股，在最后一天的竞价中售罄，反映出机构投资者和富裕投资者的强烈需求。【原文：Tata Capital Ltd.’s initial public offering — which at 155 billion rupees ($1.7 billion) is India’s largest this year — was sold out on the final day of bidding, reflecting strong demand from institutional and wealthy investors.】

item.title: 中国汽车经销商面临电动汽车转型带来的生存威胁
item.description: 中国的汽车经销商急需资金援助，因为长期的价格战和电动汽车产能的快速增长使他们举步维艰。【原文：China’s car dealerships are in urgent need of financial assistance as a long-running price war and rapid increase in production capacity for electric vehicles leave them struggling to survive.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀放缓，支持关键利率保持稳定
item.description: 瑞典 9 月份的核心通胀率连续第三个月下降，这可能会让瑞典中央银行放心，它可以按计划将利率维持在三年低位，直到明年年底。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation eased for a third straight month in September, likely reassuring the nation’s central bank that it can keep interest rates at a three-year low until late next year as planned.】

item.title: 德国工业低迷加剧，汽车生产停产
item.description: 德国工业生产创下自 2022 年初以来的最大降幅，这表明欧洲最大的经济体正在努力摆脱多年来的低迷。【原文：German industrial production fell the most since early 2022, evidence of the struggle by Europe’s biggest economy to shake off a multi-year slump.】

item.title: 澳大利亚中央银行扭亏为盈，再次放弃向政府支付红利
item.description: 由于债券收益率下降和货币贬值，澳大利亚中央银行在上一财年实现了会计利润，尽管它仍处于负资产状态，并且连续第四年没有向政府支付股息。【原文：Australia’s central bank swung to an accounting profit last financial year on lower bond yields and a depreciating currency, though it remained in negative equity and didn’t pay a dividend to the government for a fourth straight year.】

item.title: 人工智能金融科技公司 Optasia 目标成为南非一年内最大的 IPO
item.description: 人工智能驱动的金融技术公司Optasia计划在南非出售股票筹资63亿兰特（约合3.65亿美元），并利用所得资金收购公司，以满足数字金融蓬勃发展的需求。【原文：Artificial intelligence-powered financial technology firm Optasia plans to raise 6.3 billion rand ($365 million) selling shares in South Africa and use the proceeds to acquire companies as demand for digital finance booms.】

item.title: Verisure 募集 32 亿欧元，创 2000 年以来瑞典首次公开募股之最
item.description: 安保服务集团 Verisure Plc 的首次公开募股已募集到 32 亿欧元（37.2 亿美元）资金，从而巩固了斯德哥尔摩作为欧洲今年寻求上市的公司最繁忙的交易所的地位。【原文：Security services group Verisure Plc’s initial public offering has raised €3.2 billion ($3.72 billion), cementing Stockholm as the busiest European exchange for companies seeking to go public this year.】

item.title: 中国股市大涨对假日消费提振作用不大
item.description: 中国股市多年来持续时间最长的反弹，迄今为止对鼓励家庭在本月的一个重要节日期间拿出更多钱没有起到什么作用，这让已经进入放缓期的经济感到担忧。【原文：China’s longest stock rally in years has done little so far to encourage households to shell out more money during a major holiday this month, a worry for an economy already entering a slowdown.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑下跌，英国股市有望上涨
软银以 54 亿美元收购 ABB 机器人部门
item.description: 软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. ）已同意以近 54 亿美元的企业价值收购 ABB 有限公司的工业机器人部门，这反映了这家日本投资公司对这一新兴领域的兴趣。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. has agreed to acquire ABB Ltd.’s industrial robots unit at an enterprise value of almost $5.4 billion, reflecting the Japanese investment firm’s interest in the burgeoning field.】

item.title: 据说 EQT 支持的 Credila Financial 将因美国签证规定而重新评估 IPO 计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Credila Financial Services Ltd. 正在放慢在孟买首次公开募股的计划，因为该公司正努力更新其最新的财务数据。【原文：Credila Financial Services Ltd. is slowing down its plans for an initial public offering in Mumbai as the company seeks to update its latest financials, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球财政困境加剧，美元逼近两个月高点
item.description: 由于从亚太地区到欧洲的财政和经济忧虑打压了十国集团的货币，美元汇率周三接近两个月高点。【原文：The dollar approached a two-month high on Wednesday as fiscal and economic concerns from Asia Pacific to Europe weighed on the currencies of its Group-of-10 peers.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩警告通胀前景面临迫在眉睫的下行风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）警告说，消费者价格增长有可能放缓至低于 2% 的目标。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn warned that there’s the danger that consumer-price growth slows below the 2% goal.】

item.title: Anthropic 在印度开设首家办事处，发掘人工智能人才
item.description: Anthropic PBC 将在印度开设第一家办事处，与其他美国人工智能公司一起拓展这个以工程人才著称的快速增长的市场。【原文：Anthropic PBC will open its first office in India, joining other US artificial intelligence companies in expanding in the rapidly growing market known for its engineering talent.】

item.title: 挖掘，宝贝，挖掘》无法解决人工智能的电力短缺问题
item.description:
无论特朗普如何吹捧煤炭，数据中心都需要可再生能源所能产生的所有电力。【原文：

However much Trump touts coal, data centers need all the power renewables can generate.

item.title: 臃肿的预算抑制了波兰和罗马尼亚的降息空间
item.description: 由于担心宽松的财政政策会加剧通货膨胀，波兰和罗马尼亚将在周三保持利率稳定。【原文：Poland and Romania are set to keep their interest rates steady on Wednesday due to concerns that loose fiscal policy could fuel inflation.】

item.title: 勒索软件团伙麒麟声称黑客攻击导致 Beermaker Asahi 公司瘫痪
item.description: 一个名为 "Qilin "的俄语黑客组织声称对勒索软件攻击事件负责，该事件导致朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）的运营瘫痪了一个多星期。【原文：A cohort of Russian-speaking hackers known as Qilin has claimed responsibility for a ransomware attack that hobbled Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.’s operations for more than a week.】

item.title: 丰田供应商的 MBO 计划引发投资者对日本规则的抨击
item.description: 汽车零部件制造商太平洋工业公司（Pacific Industrial Co.）的管理层收购计划引起了其最大投资者之一的反弹，这给东京证券交易所增加了压力，要求在此类交易中为小股东提供更多保护。【原文：A planned management buyout of auto parts maker Pacific Industrial Co. has prompted a backlash from one of its largest investors, adding pressure on the Tokyo Stock Exchange to provide more protection for minority shareholders in such deals.】

item.title: 美联储官员敦促谨慎对待降息，铜价下跌
item.description: 由于美国联邦储备委员会官员警告不要迅速放松货币政策，铜价下跌，这削弱了金属需求增长的理由。【原文：Copper fell as US Federal Reserve officials cautioned against rapid loosening of monetary policy, undermining the case for a demand boost to metals.】

item.title: 黄金突破 4,000 美元，美国停摆为创纪录涨势火上浇油
item.description: 现货黄金价格首次攀升至每盎司 4,000 美元以上，对美国经济和政府停摆的担忧为炙热的涨势增添了新的动力。【原文：Spot gold prices climbed above $4,000 an ounce for the first time, as concerns over the US economy and a government shutdown added fresh momentum to a scorching rally.】

item.title: 新西兰央行出人意料地大幅降息后新西兰元暴跌
item.description: 在新西兰中央银行出乎市场意料地大幅降息并发出更多降息信号后，新西兰元和债券收益率下跌。【原文：New Zealand’s dollar and bond yields dropped after the central bank surprised the market with a larger-than-usual interest rate cut and signaled more reductions.】
